summary: The diff implements comprehensive NFL Combine statistics tracking with a significantly expanded data model. However, the backend implementation uses a complex CombineMeasurement wrapper structure (with verified, notes, attemptNumber, equipmentUsed fields) that was not specified in the requirements. The requirements asked for simple optional numeric values. The leaderboard (Published page) displays usernames and includes sorting, but numerical ranking (1, 2, 3...) is not clearly evident in the truncated diff. Benchmark comparisons and guest mode storage appear implemented. Several extra fields beyond the requirements (bodyFatPercentage, bmi, standingReach, seatedRow, squat, powerClean, dash10yd, shuttleProAgility) were added without being requested.

missing_requirements.requirement: Entries are ranked numerically (1, 2, 3, etc.) based on performance in the currently selected metric
missing_requirements.reason: The Published page diff shows sorting and username display, but does not show evidence of numerical rank display (1st, 2nd, 3rd) in the UI

hallucinated_features.description: Backend CombineMeasurement wrapper structure with verified, notes, attemptNumber, equipmentUsed, measurementType fields
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-4 acceptance criteria specify 'All drill and measurement fields accept optional numeric values' - the requirements do not request a complex measurement wrapper structure with verification flags, notes, and equipment tracking

hallucinated_features.description: Additional statistics: dash10yd, shuttleProAgility, bodyFatPercentage, bmi, standingReach, seatedRow, squat, powerClean
hallucinated_features.reason: Requirements explicitly list the required statistics (40-yard dash, bench press reps, vertical jump, broad jump, 3-cone drill, 20-yard shuttle, 60-yard shuttle, height, weight, arm length, hand size, wingspan). The listed additional statistics were not requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Migration system with complex OldCombineResult to NewCombineResult conversion including developerNotes and passedMedical fields
hallucinated_features.reason: No migration requirement was specified. REQ-4 acceptance criteria state 'Existing entries are preserved and can be migrated' but do not specify a formal migration system. The developerNotes and passedMedical fields were not requested.
